    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void Message.open​(AgentImpl unlockedRecipient, AgentStorage storage)
    open the message, i.e. decrypt the content with the private key of the receiving agent the private key has to be unlocked first!

    open the message, i.e. decrypt the content with the private key of the receiving agent the private key has to be unlocked first!
    void Message.open​(AgentStorage storage)
    open the message, i.e. decrypt the content with the private key of the receiving agent The storage has to know an unlocked version of the recipient agent!

    Node implementation that extends the FreePastry-based node with access to an Ethereum blockchain-based service and user registry.

  • Uses of AgentStorage in i5.las2peer.security

    Classes in i5.las2peer.security that implement AgentStorage 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  AgentContext
    A context that can be created for an agent to perform operations in the network.
    class  BasicAgentStorage
    A simple Hashtable based storage for agents.
    Constructors in i5.las2peer.security with parameters of type AgentStorage 
    Constructor Description
    BasicAgentStorage​(AgentStorage backupStorage)
    create a basic agent storage with a backupStorage to use, if a requested agent is not stored here (i.e. a Node to look for the requested agent in the whole network
